name: Kero Kero Keroppi no Mahou no Kuni Densetsu
storyline: The game is set in the Magical Kingdom. Keroppi is lost in a parallel universe, and his goal is to take down Razuri, who is scheming to conquer that kingdom.
summary: Kero Kero Keroppi no Mahō no Kuni Densetsu is a cancelled 1993 Famicom role-playing game based on the Sanrio character Keroppi. The game was planned by Character Soft who is a video game publishing subsidiary of Sanrio.
